languages.text: "Слышал, кто-то напялил на себя костяную маску и теперь ходит по палубам. Людей режет да аквилы кровью рисует".
"I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
languages.original_text: "Слышал, кто-то напялил на себя костяную маску и теперь ходит по палубам. Людей режет да аквилы кровью рисует".

traits.locale_text: "I've heard someone's put on a bone mask and is stalking the decks. Stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
"I've heard someone's put on a bone mask and is stalking the decks. Stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
"I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
"I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
"I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
"I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

languages.text: « Il paraît que quelqu'un affublé d'un masque en os poignarderait des gens sur les ponts et se servirait du sang de ses victimes pour tracer le signe de l'Aquila. »
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît que quelqu'un affublé d'un masque en os poignarderait des gens sur les ponts et se servirait du sang de ses victimes pour tracer le signe de l'Aquila. »

languages.text: «He oído que alguien está acechando por las cubiertas con una máscara de hueso, apuñalando a gente y pintando Aquilas con sangre».
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

traits.locale_text: «He oído que alguien está acechando por las cubiertas con una máscara de hueso, apuñalando a gente y pintando Aquilas con sangre».

languages.text: “我听说有人戴着骷髅面具在甲板上走来走去，见谁捅谁，还把双头鹰标志涂成了血色。”
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

traits.locale_text: “我听说有人戴着骷髅面具在甲板上走来走去，见谁捅谁，还把双头鹰标志涂成了血色。”

languages.text: 「骨の仮面をつけ、人を刺し、血でアクィラを描いている人がデッキにいると聞いた」
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

traits.locale_text: 「骨の仮面をつけ、人を刺し、血でアクィラを描いている人がデッキにいると聞いた」

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, dass jemand in einer Knochenmaske durch die Decks schleicht, Leute ersticht und mit Blut Aquilas malt."
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, dass jemand in einer Knochenmaske durch die Decks schleicht, Leute ersticht und mit Blut Aquilas malt."

languages.text: "Kemikten maskeli birisinin sinsice güverteleri izlediğini duydum. İnsanları bıçaklayıp kanlarıyla Çift Başlı Kartal çiziyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I've heard someone is stalking the decks in a bone mask, stabbing people and painting Aquilas in blood."
